description: Returns the details of one or more configuration aggregators. If the configuration aggregator is not specified, this operation returns the details for all the configuration aggregators associated with the account.

parameters.name: ConfigurationAggregatorNames
parameters.description: The name of the configuration aggregators. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ConfigurationAggregators
nested_items.description: Returns a ConfigurationAggregators object.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationAggregatorName
nested_items.description: The name of the aggregator.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationAggregatorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the aggregator.

nested_items.name: AccountAggregationSources
nested_items.description: Provides a list of source accounts and regions to be aggregated.

nested_items.name: AccountIds
nested_items.description: The 12-digit account ID of the account being aggregated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AllAwsRegions
nested_items.description: If true, aggregate existing Config regions and future regions.

nested_items.name: AwsRegions
nested_items.description: The source regions being aggregated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: OrganizationAggregationSource
nested_items.description: Provides an organization and list of regions to be aggregated.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the IAM role used to retrieve Amazon Web Services Organization details associated with the aggregator account.

nested_items.name: AwsRegions
nested_items.description: The source regions being aggregated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AllAwsRegions
nested_items.description: If true, aggregate existing Config regions and future regions.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time stamp when the configuration aggregator was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time of the last update.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services service that created the configuration aggregator.

nested_items.name: AggregatorFilters
nested_items.description: An object to filter the data you specify for an aggregator.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: An object to filter the configuration recorders based on the resource types in scope for recording.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of resource type filter to apply. INCLUDE specifies that the list of resource types in the Value field will be aggregated and no other resource types will be filtered.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Comma-separate list of resource types to filter your aggregated configuration recorders.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ServicePrincipal
nested_items.description: An object to filter service-linked configuration recorders in an aggregator based on the linked Amazon Web Services service.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of service principal filter to apply. INCLUDE specifies that the list of service principals in the Value field will be aggregated and no other service principals will be filtered.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Comma-separated list of service principals for the linked Amazon Web Services services to filter your aggregated service-linked configuration recorders.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned on a previous page that you use to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
